tool_description: Registers and manages HVAC equipment inventory with location, specifications, and maintenance requirements.

equipment_id.description: Unique identifier for the HVAC equipment

equipment_type.description: Type of HVAC equipment (chiller, boiler, air_handler, fan_coil, vav_box, exhaust_fan, heat_pump)

error_messages: Duplicate equipment ID: The equipment_id already exists in the system. Use a unique identifier.
Invalid equipment type: Use one of [chiller, boiler, air_handler, fan_coil, vav_box, exhaust_fan, heat_pump].
Invalid installation date: Provide a valid ISO 8601 date-time that is not in the future.
usage: Provide all required parameters to register new HVAC equipment. The tool creates a record in the equipment database with generated maintenance intervals based on equipment type.

recommended_maintenance_interval.description: Suggested maintenance interval in days based on equipment type
